description: Dive into "Romantic Escapes in Rawai's Hidden Gems" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Romantic Escapes in Rawai's Hidden Gems

places.generalDescription: Kata Beach, a stunning gem on Phuket's southwest coast, is renowned for its picturesque 1.5 km stretch of soft white sand and crystal-clear turquoise waters. This idyllic location is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and soaking up the sun. The beach is flanked by vibrant restaurants and resorts that cater to every need. Just a stone's throw away lies a community park designed for families seeking fun and relaxation away from the beach hustle.

sources.snippet: Rawai itself doesn‚Äôt seem to have a beach for sunbathing or swimming. However, local kids swim at each end while parents enjoy a picnic in the shade of trees. If you have booked in this part of the island, you can still find a decent sunbathing spot at the east end of the beach.
sources.shortName: Rawai Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Rawai?

places.name: Kata Beach

reviews.text:
Easily the most enjoyable beach experience if you head here slightly early in the day.

Tons of beach beds that are handled by the attendant, but also enough space at the ends to swim quietly and away from all things commercial.

The currents here are also a lot more manageable and do not pose as much of a safety risk as some of the other beaches. Could see a lot of families with young children enjoying themselves in the water.
Stunning beach at dusk. There were so many surfers and it was really pretty. Nice to walk along. A little dirty here and there but generally really well kept.

This beach had very calm and clean waters, fine sand ideal for making sand castles and clean enough for kids to play around with.
Family friendly place be it day or night. Ideal area to be with family.
Very relaxed environment, beach boys selling seats to tourists, helpful people around.

places.generalDescription: Promthep Cape, located at the southern tip of Phuket, is a picturesque lookout point renowned for its breathtaking sea views, especially during sunset. While it may be a bit challenging to access without a car, the panoramic vistas of the Andaman Sea make it worth the effort. This remote location offers a less crowded alternative to other popular spots on the island.

sources.snippet: I enjoy riding a motorcycle up the hills to take in the fresh ocean air, visiting both Promthep Cape and Windmill Viewpoint. These two iconic landmarks have become well-known locations at sunset for locals and visitors alike. Laem Krating Viewpoint, unlike nearby Promthep Cape and Windmill Viewpoint which are more famous, is one of the best-kept secrets and lesser known attractions in Rawai.

Promthep Cape View Point is famous for striking sunsets framed by iconic sugar palm trees. It is such a symbolic landmark of Phuket island that you can recognise it on the Phuket car plates with a ‚Äòlucky plate number‚Äô.
sources.shortName: Rawai Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Rawai?

sources.snippet: However, what you have seen is nothing if it was not from Promthep Cape viewpoint. The sight from here is glorious. Being a rocky headland jutting from the sea, it provides a spectacular view during sunset and sunrise.
sources.shortName: Romantic getaways in Phuket for couples

places.name: Promthep Cape

reviews.text: Great spot with a beautiful view over the sea. We came in the late afternoon, and it was already getting a bit busy, especially near the viewpoint. Didn't stay long enough for sunset, but you can tell it would be a fantastic place to watch it. You can walk down towards the cliffs ‚Äì the path isn't too long, but it's steep and slippery in places, so proper shoes are a good idea. Parking was straightforward, and there are plenty of small shops nearby selling food, drinks, and souvenirs.

Promthep Cape is one of the best spots in Phuket to watch the sunset üåÖ. The view is magical, with the ocean stretching endlessly and the sky changing colors every minute. It does get a bit crowded, but honestly the atmosphere is so lively it feels part of the experience. I ended up just sitting on the rocks, enjoying the breeze and laughing at myself for trying to take 100 sunset photos when every single one already looked perfect üòÖüì∏. Truly a must-visit-sunset here is unforgettable!

Really beautiful place üòç a must visit!
Unfortunately we went on a cloudy day, so it was not really possible to view the sunset. But it was still beautiful nonetheless. If you have the opportunity, definitely come here to see the sunset!

places.address: ‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏°‡∏û‡∏£‡∏´‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏ó‡∏û, Rawai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Yanui Beach, located on the west coast of Phuket just south of Nai Harn, is a small and secluded sandy beach surrounded by trees. Despite its unassuming appearance, it offers a serene atmosphere for activities like snorkeling and kayaking, especially during sunset. The beach is known for its clear waters and beautiful views of nearby islands. It's considered an ideal spot for families seeking a peaceful retreat away from the busier beaches on Phuket's main island.

sources.snippet: Yanui Beach, not far from Nai Harn, is a small but charming stretch of sand that is particularly popular for swimming and snorkelling. The clear, calm waters are ideal for exploring marine life, and the beach has a friendly atmosphere. While it can get busy during peak times, Yanui Beach remains a delightful spot to unwind and enjoy the area‚Äôs natural beauty.
sources.shortName: Rawai Sea Gypsy Village in Phuket

sources.snippet: Ya Nui is a small but much-loved sandy cove located below the Windmill Viewpoint mentioned earlier, only 2 kilometres west of Rawai.
sources.shortName: Rawai Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Rawai?

places.name: ‡πçYanui Beach

reviews.text:
Ya Nui Beach is a charming cove located in the southern part of Phuket, Thailand. This small beach is celebrated for its picturesque scenery, featuring soft, powdery sand and clear, blue-green waters. Its natural beauty make it a favored spot for both relaxation and various water activities.

The beach's rocky areas and clear waters provide excellent conditions for snorkeling. One can explore vibrant marine life close to the shore, with snorkeling gear available for rent.

Visitors can rent kayaks and stand-up paddleboards. Paddling out to the nearby Koh Man island, situated roughly 700 meters offshore, is a popular activity when the sea is calm.

A couple of local restaurants are situated across the road from the beach, offering a variety of Thai dishes and refreshments.

Overall, Ya Nui Beach provides a serene and scenic environment, ideal for those seeking a more intimate beach experience with opportunities for adventure and relaxation alike.
A gorgeous beach which is fabulous for snorkelling with wonderful fish a couple of metres from the waters edge but the downside is the rubbish floating in the water which is so sad to see.

My visit to Yanui Beach in Phuket was a delightful escape from the island's busier spots.

Tucked between Windmill Viewpoint and Promthep Cape, this small, crescent-shaped cove offers soft golden sand and clear, turquoise waters perfect for a serene day out.

Arriving early via Bolt from Kata (15-minute ride, with 250-400 THB), the beach was tranquil, with hardly any crowds. Snorkeling around the northern headland and rocky promontory was fantastic, vibrant corals and fish abound, with gear rentals at 100 THB. Kayaking to Koh Man, a nearby island, was a highlight for just 100-150 THB/hour.

The beach's laid-back vibe, framed by lush hills, is ideal for families and couples. Two small restaurants across the road, like Royros, serve tasty Thai dishes (200 THB) and refreshing coconut drinks.

However, litter in the water was noticeable, and low tide exposes rocks, making swimming tricky. No sunbeds or umbrellas keep it unspoiled, but bring a towel for shade under trees. Parking is limited, so arrive early.

Despite minor drawbacks, Yanui's charm and proximity to stunning viewpoints make it a must-visit for a peaceful Phuket beach day.

places.generalDescription: Banana Beach, located on Coral Island and accessible by long-tail boat from Rawai Beach, is a hidden gem with pristine white sand and turquoise waters. This secluded paradise offers opportunities for water sports like parasailing, banana-boat rides, and kayaking. Surrounded by lush green jungle, it remains unspoiled and relatively undiscovered due to its remote location.

sources.snippet: After breakfast, rent one of the long-tail boats at Rawai Beach to Banana Beach on Coral Island. This beautiful beach boasts a stretch of white sand lapped by striking turquoise waters, where you don‚Äôt have to swim out far to find some coral reefs and colourful marine life under the water. Try out the water sports and outdoor adventure activities like parasailing, banana-boat ride and kayak.

places.name: Banana Beach

reviews.text:
Banana Beach is an absolute gem and one of the best spots to visit in Thailand. It's a bit more secluded compared to other beaches, which makes it a perfect escape from the crowds. The crystal-clear water, soft golden sand, and surrounding lush greenery create a breathtaking setting that feels like paradise.

The beach is clean and well-maintained, and the water is perfect for swimming and snorkeling. There are plenty of colourful fish to see, making it a great spot for anyone who enjoys marine life. The waves are usually calm, so it's safe for all ages. You can also rent kayaks or paddleboards if you want to explore the coastline.

There's a small beachfront restaurant that serves fresh seafood and delicious Thai dishes. Sitting there with a drink in hand, enjoying the view, is an experience in itself. Despite being a hidden spot, the staff and locals around the area are friendly and welcoming.

Getting to Banana Beach requires a short boat ride or a bit of a walk, but it's absolutely worth it. If you're looking for a peaceful, beautiful beach with amazing scenery, this is the place to go. I'll definitely be back!

Extremely clear water for snorkeling. Everything is paid for if you need to use any of the beach facilities so make sure you're aware of those costs before going. We also saw hornbill birds which was fun. The restaurant was average and expensive but this was expected

Wonderful staff, thank you, Lative! We were here last year and will be this week! Lots of exiting activities like banana boat, kayak etc! No trash on the Banana beach, compared to Coral Beach, clear sand and water, lots of corals and fishes! Wonderful place for snorkelling, eating good food and spending time!

places.address: Rawai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Rawai Beach, situated at the southernmost tip of Phuket, is a popular destination known for its fishing boats, picturesque views, and seaside dining options. It has been a tourist attraction since the early days of Phuket's tourism industry. The area is home to numerous hotels and restaurants offering delicious Thai and European cuisine at reasonable prices. Additionally, Rawai Beach provides easy access to Nai Harn Beach through a complimentary shuttle service.

sources.snippet: Visit the Phuket Shell Museum near Rawai Beach to dive into a diverse collection of rare seashells and marine artefacts. Marvel at exquisite specimens, including giant clam shells and delicate coral formations, showcasing the beauty and diversity of ocean life. Learn about the natural history of marine ecosystems and conservation efforts through informative displays.
sources.shortName: How To Reach, Best Time & Tips
Rawai Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Rawai?

places.name: Rawai Beach

reviews.text: Quite place. Not overly populated (some areas still are in low season). Plenty of restaurants,  supermarkets,  convenience, and souvenir stores. Public benches are available to use. Beautiful panoramic views.

Unfortunately lots of plastic garbage :(

While the turquoise water looks absolutely stunning and you get to see the beautiful long boats, I wouldn't recommend this beach. There was no clean spot in the sand to sit down. Also, it was very noisy as there is a busy road right next to the esplanade.

This beach is a truly lovely spot, where you can enjoy the peaceful scenery and watch the colorful fishing boats under the sunny or cloudy sky. While you might not be able to swim, there's so much beauty to enjoy all around!

places.generalDescription: Zen Eat is a restaurant located in Rawai Beach, specifically on Saiyuan Road. It offers a diverse menu featuring meaty favorites and an extensive selection of French Fusion cuisine. Additionally, visitors can explore the Rawai Seafood Market to obtain the freshest catch from the sea and have it prepared at one of the nearby restaurants.

sources.snippet: Saiyuan Road is full of international and seafood restaurants to choose from, but my favourite is Zen Eat where you‚Äôll find a varied menu of meaty favourites and an expansive selection of French Fusion. There‚Äôs no shortage of the freshest catch from the sea at the Rawai Seafood Market. Here I always get the freshest seafood from friendly locals and pick one of the many restaurants in the area to cook it for dinner.

places.name: ZEN EAT

reviews.text:
This French restaurant in Rawai is a true treasure! We dine here often, and every visit is consistently amazing.
The experience is always top-notch, with a menu that frequently refreshes to offer delightful surprises.
The creative kitchen takes meticulous care with every detail, making each dish a masterpiece.

The owner's presence adds a special touch-he runs a highly organized and welcoming space where you feel truly cared for as a guest.
The attention to detail in service and ambiance is outstanding.

Do yourself a favor and try the mango cheesecake-it's my all-time favorite dessert and an absolute must-have!
Highly recommended for anyone looking for an exceptional dining experience in Rawai.

Wow. Just wow. We've been traveling around Asia for 4 months and tried so many places with ‚ÄúWestern-style‚Äù food, but nothing ever matched the quality and taste we were craving. Until now. THIS PLACE absolutely delivered. Everything was spot on: the appetizers, the mains, the desserts, even the drinks. Flawless. 10/10. We were blown away. If you're in the area, do yourself a favor and eat here. You won't regret it.

The restaurant offers French cuisine with dishes plated with great care and creativity, a detail that immediately stands out. Some dishes I found truly good, while others didn't quite meet my personal taste.

Unfortunately, the atmosphere doesn't match the visual quality of the dishes: plastic chairs and tables, along with placemats that feel reminiscent of a cheap restaurant, detract from the overall experience-especially considering the prices. Another negative detail was the use of very low-quality olive oil, which was disappointing.

A positive note is definitely the staff, who are always kind and attentive. However, there was an unpleasant episode with the owner during payment: while teaching a waitress how to use the POS machine, he became visibly annoyed when she struggled to tear off the receipt, sighing and shaking his head. It left a negative and unprofessional impression.

In summary, a restaurant with potential but some details that need improvement, both in the location and the service.

places.address: 50/7 Soi Saiyuan 7, Rawai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83130, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Phuket Serenity Villas Co., Ltd. is a fantastic choice for travelers seeking a blend of relaxation and adventure in Rawai. Nestled among an array of delightful dining options, including the Two Chefs Beach Bar and Restaurant, guests can savor meals with stunning sea views right from their balconies or enjoy beachfront dining‚Äîa perfect romantic experience. For those who prefer to unwind at the villa, Balus Bar offers a serene atmosphere to soak in the beauty of the night sky over the ocean.

sources.snippet: Rawai is a great place to stay and there are a myriad of restaurants around Rawai including the Two Chefs Beach Bar and Restaurant at Serenity. At Serenity you can even eat from the balcony of your seaview room or actually dine by the beach, which is an experience you want to share with your loved one. If you are not going out to eat, you can just chill and spend some quality time as you enjoy the beauty of the sea by night  at our own Balu‚Äôs Bar.
sources.shortName: Romantic getaways in Phuket for couples

places.name: Phuket Serenity Villas Co., Ltd.

reviews.text:
We felt very comfortable...despite the rainy season. Eric, the manager, is always available, quick and very reliable and friendly. We will be back.
Eckhard from Germany

By far the best and most friendly service in thailand. Not only did they provide my wife and I, lovely accomodation but gave us great information about restaurants, laundry service, and visa information. They were always a text msg away. Thanks again and look forward to seeing you guys next year.

Phuket Serenity Villas with its owners Ying and Eric are very professional Real Estate Agents in Phuket. I have used their services on several occasions and was always satisfied with their offers and services. To me it seemed that the many years PSV being in the real estate business here in Phuket came to my advantage as they are always up to date of all the projects going on.

places.generalDescription: Ra Wai Beach, located at the southern end of Phuket island, is renowned as the first tourist beach on the island. While not suitable for swimming, it offers stunning views of nearby islands and a tranquil local atmosphere. The beach serves as a departure point for boat tours to various islands and sightseeing spots in the surrounding sea. Visitors can enjoy fresh seafood at nearby restaurants and explore the local fishing community.
places.name: Ra Wai Beach

reviews.text:
The beach is full of docked boats, making it unsuitable for sunbathing or swimming, but it provides a different kind of vibe.

I enjoy observing the numerous small animals without needing to dive.

The place is practically empty, tranquil, and serene. It's easily accessible; just park and enjoy a walk.

Surrounding environment is suitable for just sightseeing the vibe over there.  I wouldn't recommend for swimming or playing sand at here as you can see from the pictures there are a lot of boats and the nearly no place to walk nearby the ocean
Great for dining, walking and getting the vibe. Not suitable for a perfect sun and sand experience. Mainly boats with less space to swim or enjoy the nature.

places.generalDescription: Coral Island, also known as Koh Hey, is a must-visit gem in the Phuket region that promises an unforgettable day of adventure and relaxation. Just a short speedboat ride from Rawai Beach, this stunning island boasts pristine white sands and crystal-clear waters perfect for various water sports. Whether you're into snorkeling, scuba diving, or thrilling activities like parasailing and banana boat rides, Coral Island has it all!

sources.snippet: Rawai beach is good for food - most of the beach road is lined with small restaurants - and from Rawai you can get a speedboat or longtail boat to nearby islands such as Koh Bon, Coral Island, Racha Yai island. We did a trip last year from Rawai to explore the small island of Koh Kaew Yai which lies off the tip of Cape Phromthep and is a place of pilgrimage for Buddhists - there is a big Buddha statue on the island and a giant "Buddha footprint". Legend says that Buddha stepped onto the island before coming to the mainland of Phuket, where he first visited Rawai.

Coral Island is just 15 minutes away by longtail boats from Rawai. It consists of 2 beautiful beaches: Banana Beach, which can be rather crowded with tourists, and Long Beach, where the Coral Island Resort offers beach bungalows. Note that the Banana Beach on Coral Island is not the same as the Banana Beach on Phuket Island!
sources.shortName: Rawai Beach ‚õ±Ô∏è How to make the best of your stay in Rawai?

places.name: Coral Island

reviews.text:
Great spot for diving and more!
Insta: chachoux22 for more photo/video
It's can be quite touristy but I had an amazing time a lot of cool fish and coral all around that's why the name.
Only thing is that you pay for the taxi en then on the island you have to pay for the entry kinda of like a tourist trap but yeah..

Coral Island, also known as Koh Hae, is a stunning tropical paradise just a short boat ride from Phuket. The island boasts crystal-clear waters, soft white sand, and vibrant marine life, making it perfect for snorkeling, diving, and relaxing on the beach. The coral reefs are teeming with colorful fish, offering an unforgettable underwater experience. Several beachfront restaurants serve delicious Thai cuisine, allowing visitors to enjoy a meal with breathtaking ocean views. Whether you're seeking adventure or a peaceful escape, Coral Island provides a perfect blend of natural beauty and relaxation. A must-visit destination in Thailand!

Very beautiful beach to relax and snorkel. The water is clear and good for swimming.

You can get a long boat from Rawai beach and spend the whole day chilling by the beach.

You need to pay 100 thb per person to enter the beach. You get access to the beach and chairs to relax.

There is a bar, restaurant, and toilets at the beach.

places.address: Unnamed Rd Tambon Rawai Amphoe Mueang Phuket Chang Wat Phuket 83100Ê≥∞ÂõΩ, Tambon Rawai, Amphoe Mueang Phuket, Chang Wat Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Boathouse Restaurant in Cherngtalay offers a unique dining experience with a blend of traditional Thai dishes and international flavors. The menu features creative dishes like Foie Gras Bites Thai Style, Tuna Tartar in Thai Style, Sea Bass Steak, Rice Berry Risotto, Coconut Prawn and Green Curry Sauce. The restaurant's interior design provides an intimate ambiance with indoor and outdoor dining areas, a counter bar, and BBQ terrace.

sources.snippet: The Boathouse Restaurant, Kata Beach | Credit: The Boathouse Phuket. Dining here is considered to be one of the most romantic experiences in Phuket by many people. This iconic restaurant is located directly on the waterfront of Kata Beach, serving Thai and International cuisine, superb wines and panoramic ocean views‚Ä¶ read more
sources.shortName: 14 Most Romantic Restaurants & Bars in Phuket

places.name: The Boathouse Restaurant

reviews.text:
I recently had lunch at Boathouse and it was an incredible experience. The food was absolutely delicious, everything was cooked to perfection.

Chef Jonathan was so friendly and engaging, making the entire lunch experience feel so special.

The service was also excellent, with the staff being attentive and courteous.

If you're looking for a good atmosphere, lunch by the beach, I highly recommend. Thank you for incredible experience.

There really are no words to describe the level of service we received here tonight. Daniele you and your staff are an absolute credit to this place. We can not wait to stay here on our next visit and will certainly be telling our Australian friends about you. Food was outstanding. Please visit. You will not regret it. Photos don't do this place justice.

Had a lovely meal at The Boathouse. The restaurant is right on the beach with beautiful views, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy the setting.

The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and the food was good across the board. Everything was nicely presented and full of flavour.

Must have: The massaman curry. Rich, comforting and really well done.

Great place for a beachfront meal with a relaxed vibe. Would definitely come back

places.address: Karon, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled on the stunning Kata Beach with breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea and lush Thai forests, Mom Tri's Kitchen is a renowned dining destination in Phuket. The restaurant offers a blend of modern and traditional Thai dishes paired with creative cocktails crafted by expert mixologists. Whether it's a romantic date night or a special dinner, this elegant establishment provides an unforgettable experience.

sources.snippet: Mom Tri‚Äôs Kitchen is a popular upscale restaurant in Phuket that is known for its romantic setting and stunning sea views. The restaurant is located at Villa Royale, a boutique resort in Kata Beach. The restaurant offers a diverse menu that includes a mix of Thai and international cuisine, with an emphasis on fresh seafood.

places.name: Mom Tri's Kitchen

reviews.text: Dine with a splendid view, this place did have a vibe of its own that made our group feel very calm and relaxed. Great menu to choose from and their cocktail list was quite amazing! The staff were very courteous we had a great time for a family dinner and were almost glued to our seats and not wanting to leave even after our dinner. Highly recommend this place if you like to spend some quiet time with your favourite people over some good food and drinks.

Had the most amazing experience coming here with my partner for our anniversary dinner. The staff were welcoming and very attentive. The food was tasty , it was absolutely incredible! The drinks were lovely! And finally the view, even during monsoon season was stunning! (we were lucky tonight as it was pouring all day) 10/10 highly recommended.

Incredible is the best way to describe this experience, hands down one of the best restaurants I have ever been to. The view is to die for and the food is nothing short of that. Service was super friendly and accomodating, thank you to the beautiful wait staff and kitchen staff for giving us such a beautiful experience. We will definitely be back!! üíï‚ú®

places.address: R75W+XVH, Karon, Mueang, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83100, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Coconut Rawai is a great place to go for live music. A different band plays every night, and on Thursdays they have quiz night. The audience is very relaxed and the service is friendly. You can find delicious food here too, especially if you opt for something hot on the plate!

sources.snippet: Nestled under a thatched roof, Coconut Bar and Restaurant is an attractive open-sided dining and drinking venue catering to travellers looking to enjoy a laid-back night out in a relaxed and romantic atmosphere. Located across the road from the beach, Coconut Bar is an ideal place to enjoy the sunset views while sipping a cocktail or a glass of wine.
sources.shortName: 8 Spots for the Best Nightlife in Rawai

places.name: Coconut at Rawai Beach

reviews.text: A really great place for good beer and as the best live music and only a 5minute walk from my hotel! The Rawai palm resort.All the staff too are very friendly and accommodating.Recommend 100%

The best pub in Rawai, the staff are very friendly and the food and drinks very fairly priced and value for money. Whenever I visit Phuket I don't miss visiting Coconut Rawai
enjoy some live music and some drinks. They play different kind of music throughout the week. The best is you can also sing üé§ with the band.

If you like drinking warm beer üç∫  I recommend you frequent Coconut at Rawai Beach Bar.
We do like to have a beer üç∫  before we go out for dinner.  Coconut Bar is conveniently close to our hotel. But for the 3rd time in a row we had reason to complain about the beer temperature.
This time I complained bitterly to the staff,  and explained that we won't ever be back.
In Thailand's heat and humidity you really do need a cold refreshing beer. Not possible at Coconut Bar when they have the refrigerator thermostat set at 5.7c. [Photo supplied].
I cannot recommend this place.

places.address: 57, 13 Beach Road, Rawai, Beach, Phuket 83130, Thailand
